1466730.name: Filmmaker Tycoon Soundtrack
1466730.description:
Put your feet up and enjoy the self proclaimed ICONIC movie music from Filmmaker Tycoon!

The Filmmaker Tycoon Soundtrack contains all the relaxing ambience of Hollywood, blood-pumping action, emotional drama, haunting horror, passionate romance, and dadgum fantastic western music!


Fantasize about hittin’ it BIG in-game (and in real life!) with the professionally composed Ambient music disk.

Each Genre music disk presents the music in 3 acts, each offering something more than the last! With increased intensity and quality through the acts, you can listen to your Studio's improvement in real time.

Secure this Soundtrack today and immerse yourself in the world of Filmmaker Tycoon!
